scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml up --build postgres -d && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run -w @graphcalculator/client dev" "npm run -w @graphcalculator/server dev"
scripts.preview: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yaml up -d  && cross-env NODE_ENV=preview npm run -w @graphcalculator/server start
scripts.build-preview: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=preview npm run -w @graphcalculator/client build && npm run -w @graphcalculator/client zip && npm run -w @graphcalculator/server build
scripts.build-production: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=production npm run -w @graphcalculator/client build && npm run -w @graphcalculator/client zip && npm run -w @graphcalculator/server build
